# Reference Diplomacy SVG Map - Turkey Territories

Research deliverable for aot-2kxsy.

## Source

**jDip egdipmap.svg** from https://github.com/rgo/jDip
- Path: `resource/variants/stdVariants/egdipmap.svg`
- ViewBox: `0 0 1835 1360`
- License: GPL

## Turkey Territory SVG Paths

### Constantinople (CON) - Supply Center

Constantinople has TWO path elements in a group (represents the straits):

```svg
<!-- Path 1: European side + Bosphorus area -->
M 1331 1267 C 1320 1272 1310 1264 1298 1274 C 1289 1282 1298 1291 1291 1305 C 1289 1310 1284 1314 1287 1316 C 1289 1319 1295 1316 1303 1317 C 1303 1317 1303 1319 1303 1319 C 1299 1321 1292 1327 1290 1332 C 1294 1330 1296 1329 1297 1324 C 1297 1324 1323 1304 1323 1304 C 1323 1304 1337 1298 1337 1298 C 1337 1298 1356 1294 1356 1294 C 1356 1294 1340 1282 1340 1282 C 1340 1282 1331 1267 1331 1267 z M 1414 1284 C 1414 1284 1389 1288 1389 1288 C 1389 1288 1375 1292 1375 1292 C 1372 1292 1361 1293 1364 1299 C 1366 1301 1376 1303 1380 1304 C 1380 1304 1380 1306 1380 1306 C 1380 1306 1367 1310 1367 1310 C 1367 1310 1357 1315 1357 1315 C 1357 1315 1348 1318 1348 1318 C 1341 1321 1342 1326 1329 1326 C 1322 1326 1314 1323 1308 1328 C 1304 1331 1290 1344 1288 1349 C 1287 1351 1287 1353 1288 1356 C 1296 1354 1305 1345 1307 1359 C 1307 1359 1307 1364 1307 1364 C 1311 1361 1315 1355 1319 1355 C 1323 1354 1328 1358 1331 1360 C 1335 1363 1340 1364 1345 1365 C 1355 1366 1363 1362 1368 1361 C 1374 1361 1378 1364 1383 1365 C 1389 1365 1393 1361 1400 1361 C 1405 1361 1407 1361 1412 1362 C 1414 1363 1418 1364 1419 1363 C 1422 1362 1424 1355 1424 1352 C 1429 1337 1427 1328 1422 1314 C 1422 1314 1416 1297 1416 1297 C 1415 1292 1416 1288 1414 1284 z M 1346 1295 C 1346 1295 1346 1296 1346 1296 C 1346 1296 1345 1295 1345 1295 C 1345 1295 1346 1295 1346 1295 z

<!-- Path 2: Asian side connection -->
M 1348 1283 C 1350 1286 1356 1290 1357 1292 C 1359 1297 1352 1298 1349 1299 C 1334 1302 1327 1302 1314 1313 C 1314 1313 1297 1329 1297 1329 C 1294 1332 1292 1335 1287 1333 C 1282 1339 1281 1340 1285 1347 C 1291 1341 1304 1327 1311 1323 C 1318 1320 1324 1326 1335 1323 C 1341 1321 1342 1318 1347 1316 C 1347 1316 1357 1312 1357 1312 C 1357 1312 1366 1308 1366 1308 C 1366 1308 1375 1305 1375 1305 C 1371 1303 1366 1304 1363 1301 C 1359 1297 1363 1291 1371 1290 C 1366 1279 1358 1276 1348 1283 z
```

### Ankara (ANK) - Supply Center

```svg
M 1424 1364 C 1437 1361 1448 1353 1459 1346 C 1464 1343 1470 1337 1475 1336 C 1482 1334 1492 1338 1499 1340 C 1510 1342 1518 1341 1528 1336 C 1544 1328 1555 1307 1575 1297 C 1587 1291 1598 1293 1611 1293 C 1614 1293 1621 1292 1624 1292 C 1646 1286 1638 1257 1637 1241 C 1618 1244 1604 1253 1583 1253 C 1566 1253 1565 1248 1554 1246 C 1553 1247 1553 1248 1551 1248 C 1548 1249 1541 1242 1538 1240 C 1535 1242 1529 1247 1526 1246 C 1521 1245 1517 1235 1511 1235 C 1507 1236 1507 1239 1497 1241 C 1483 1243 1471 1243 1457 1249 C 1450 1253 1440 1261 1435 1266 C 1433 1268 1421 1282 1420 1284 C 1419 1286 1419 1290 1419 1292 C 1419 1300 1423 1305 1425 1312 C 1428 1318 1430 1326 1431 1333 C 1432 1342 1427 1355 1424 1364 z
```

### Armenia (ARM) - Non-Supply Center

```svg
M 1671 1218 C 1663 1226 1648 1237 1638 1240 C 1638 1240 1641 1241 1641 1241 C 1641 1241 1643 1272 1643 1272 C 1642 1279 1638 1298 1639 1303 C 1641 1311 1648 1312 1652 1318 C 1658 1325 1657 1329 1657 1337 C 1657 1337 1708 1337 1708 1337 C 1708 1337 1720 1338 1720 1338 C 1720 1338 1730 1338 1730 1338 C 1730 1338 1825 1348 1825 1348 C 1825 1348 1837 1349 1837 1349 C 1837 1349 1845 1349 1845 1349 C 1853 1349 1867 1347 1874 1345 C 1892 1339 1913 1320 1927 1307 C 1927 1307 1956 1280 1956 1280 C 1956 1280 1938 1277 1938 1277 C 1922 1273 1905 1266 1896 1251 C 1894 1251 1890 1252 1888 1252 C 1883 1251 1872 1247 1869 1242 C 1868 1240 1867 1220 1858 1221 C 1853 1221 1846 1232 1843 1236 C 1833 1248 1822 1262 1805 1261 C 1784 1260 1786 1252 1767 1252 C 1767 1252 1753 1252 1753 1252 C 1753 1252 1736 1251 1736 1251 C 1727 1251 1722 1253 1713 1250 C 1697 1243 1680 1223 1671 1218 z
```

## Bug Found

**CRITICAL:** The current `src/data/territories.ts` has Constantinople (`con`) using Albania's path!

Current (incorrect):
```typescript
// territories.ts line 523 - this is ALBANIA's path, not Constantinople's
path: 'M 1149 1316 C 1136 1313 1137 1308 1136 1297...'
```

The same path is correctly used for Albania at line 503. This means both `con` and `alb` currently render to the same shape.

## Other Resources

- **Wikimedia Commons**: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Diplomacy.svg (original by Martin Asal)
- **elespike/diplomacy_maps**: https://github.com/elespike/diplomacy_maps (CC-BY-SA 4.0, but unified nation polygons)
- **webDiplomacy**: https://github.com/kestasjk/webDiplomacy (PNG-based, AGPL-3.0)

## Reference SVG Location

Downloaded to: `/tmp/jdip_egdipmap.svg` (during research session)

To re-download:
```bash
curl -sL "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rgo/jDip/master/resource/variants/stdVariants/egdipmap.svg" -o /tmp/jdip_egdipmap.svg
```
